mapper.insert: insert into person_receipt(receipt_name, receipt_phone, province_id, city_id, county_id,receipt_detail ,receipt_bit,user_id) values(#{receipt_name},#{receipt_phone},#{province_id},#{city_id}, #{county_id},#{receipt_detail},#{receipt_bit},#{user_id})
mapper.update: update person_receipt set receipt_bit=#{status} where receipt_id=#{id}
